title: Genome-wide mapping of G-quadruplex DNA: a step-by-step guide to select the most effective method
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, 5,426-438
DOI: 10.1039/D4CB00023D, Review Article
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Silvia Galli, Gem Flint, Lucie Růžičková, Marco Di Antonio
Overview of the strengths and weaknesses of the current genomics approaches to mapping DNA G-quadruplex structures, facilitating the selection of the most suitable method based on specific needs.
